story:
THIS PAGE IS CURRENTLY NOT ACTIVE AND ALL DONATIONS WILL BE REFUNDED

REFUND CONTACT: TonyBakersBoys@gmail.com

 

Short Summary

What's up peeps? Creator Thomas Fraser and lead actor Tony Baker would love to produce a season of a show called Baker's Boys on Youtube, streaming or network television. Baker's Boys would be a show about a recently divorced comedian, Tony, who makes the very hard decision of slowing down his career to stay in town to be closer to his teenage boys before they go to college.

Not only will we follow Tony and a cast of characters through life, but we will also understand why a two parent household and sticking around to be a father is one of the most important basis for a healthy and balanced life.

Thomas and Tony will mix their lives together (a la Phil Rosenthal and Ray Ramano, Everybody Hates Raymond) to bring you the kind of humor you are used to enjoying from Tony Baker --Everyman, natural, down home, thoughtful, insightful, wacky and honest humor.

Take a look at the first episode above and contribute if you'd like to see more. Creator Thomas Fraser started this journey by using his own money to produce this pilot. We are not waiting for a handout. We are creating our own destiny. But you can't do everything yourself and now we need your help. EVERY DOLLAR COUNTS.

"God Bless the child that's got his own."

Tony Baker (Comedian, Actor) who currently has 1.1 MILLION FOLLOWERS on Instagram was born Anthony C. Baker in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Tony and his family quickly moved back to the city of Chicago where he was raised on the south side. His passion for film started at a very early age and stayed with him throughout his life. While attending New Mexico State University his creative ideas were brought to the forefront while writing and directing films with his colleagues just for the love of it.  His love for theater developed when he made his stage debut in the University production of "Of Mice & Men" in which he received his first acting award. After bringing his acting talents to the stage he knew that it was time to make the dream a reality and uprooted his family to California to pursue a career in acting and stand up comedy. Since then he's appeared in many tv shows and movies including Whiplash, A Black Lady Sketch Show, The Carmicheal Show and Last Comic Standing.

Thomas Fraser (Creator, Writer, Actor) attended The Baltimore School for the Arts and graduated with a major in Theater. He moved to Los Angeles and worked with the sketch comedy stage show Cleos Apartment which spawned an 8 year stand up comedy run. That show was picked up by HBO/AOL and called The Message. Thomas has also trained with The Groundlings for Improv and UCLA for screenwriting. Mr. Fraser has had several short self produced films showcase on national television including the NBC Short Film Fest finalist film, Voicemail. Thomas' talents have been displayed on Insecure, Played By Fame, Women Behind Bars, The Road to Sundance and Buddy Solitaire just to name a few.

 

What We Need & What You Get

An explanation of what each perk will garner is located on the right.

Our goal is $60,000 because that's what it will take to properly produce a season of this project. We'll have post production, crew, sound, insurance, cameras, permits, editing, craft sevices and many more costs. This will help us create an original show with a specific look that pleases the pallet of Netflix and other network company execs.

 

The Impact

We're looking to affect lives in the way that The Cosby Show, A Different World and Family Matters affected ours. Those shows showed us what's possible if you put your heart and soul into your project and deal with real issues. 

The tone of the show will be Insecure mixed with Atlanta. Real stories and real issues with natural humor constantly at play. Our creator has spent the past few years making short films, preparing for this moment.

In 2013 he became a finalist in the NBC Short Film Festival with his film Voicemail, starring CBS's Simone Missick. You can view that film here free now --> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n7ZQFwaW2I4

Since that time he's had several films/sketches air on national television. Including two he did with Tony Baker, Paycheck https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g75cibMJCv0&amp... and Rent A Hype Man https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S9Z4-UHM_t8

Bonus Video - Dogs vs Cats - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yKyofafscw0&amp...

Your contribution would mean that our idea is solid and you'd like to invest in good quality humor. Watching the video above and making a pledge will give us the numbers we need both financially and visually to present to networks and make a good case for why our show should be on the air.

People have a hunger for Tony Baker's brand of comedy. Currently, millions of people follow Tony everyday just to find out about his national comedy tours, movie reviews, podcasts and sketches. Even Tony's pet cat has followers now and he's 1.

 

Risks & Challenges

When doing things on your own, there are always risks. That's why our budget comes with a 10% contingency plan to help cover any last minute costs.  We also have a team with many years of experience. We have hired people who work in the flim and tv industry for a living to ensure quality performance.

We have surrounded ourselves with a strong group of problem solvers that all have the same goal.

The amount of episodes we shoot will directly correlate to the amount we raise. This provides us an opportunity to still showcase our concept just with less episodes.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Trust me. I used to be extremely broke. So I understand that sometimes you don't have the cash to give. We will definitely accept smaller donations such as $1, $5 or $10. Just click the BACK IT button above to contribute smaller amounts and thank you in advance for your support. We will build this house brick by brick.

And if that's too much then simply sharing our page with family, parents and friends would be greatly appreciated.  Let them know why you want them to help support this show and what it means to you. And send them your favorite Tony Baker videos to sweeten the pot.

story:
About Myself

I am Santosh Khanal. I live in capital city of Nepal. I have been working on front end and back end of web development for about 5 years. You can see my profile at freelancer.com.
https://www.freelancer.com/u/khanalsantoshnp.html

 

I have been working on front end project for a very long time. I have got so much experience in html/css/js/jquery/scss/less. I have got success in every project I have worked on for a client. And my clients always seek me for their projects.

Just like the saying, (with great power comes great responsibility). I want to help you all who are seeking a career in front end web development.

I will teach you all the things required for starting and progress you as a great developer.

 

Short Summary

I had so much tough time starting my self. When I started working on this field, there were so less content to start learning.
There was boundary for me. I used to search for tutorials and video lessons on youtube and other free sites. That's the first reason I could not get good content to start myself. I was keeping up with the flow and never stopped learning.

But this will not be with you. I want to make your carrier start with a bang and help you keep up with the flow. I will not only guide you to with the HTML/CSS/JS and help running the current flow. But also guide you to keep up with the updated things once they are available. Meaning, I will guide you to search and find things that will excel you further when there are different things coming along the way.

And furthermore I will make you be able to earn around $1.5k+ every month and it will increase according to your effort and commitment. You can apply/bid on projects online and get it. Or just go for a new job and get selected in front end web development and excel on it.

 

What You Get

I always dreamed of having a great instructor who knows how things are and what is the best method to learn. I expected an instructor to have some skill to show when things come along the journey. I know what it hurts, what are the pains and I want to you be aware of them along your journey to become successful as soon as possible.

 

Below are the things you get:

  1. Guide to start along the HTML, get knowledge about every html elements, and writing semantic/seo friendly HTML.
  2. You will follow along writing css and style the webpage all on your own. Along the journey I will guide you to make webpage same across all the browsers giving you details about the things they differ in browsers, give you hacks/tricks about things. And at last guide you to the pre-processor SCSS/LESS along the way.
  3. Then I will give you knowledge on Javascript and jQuery, and help you make your webpage interactive. I will also give you tricks on how to find plugins, implement them and also learn how to work on some of them too.
  4. And at last after I give you insight into the things needed for front end web development. I will show you how to finish up working on already designed psd and implement it from starting to the end. On this section, I may take up top 5 psd from you and implement them. so you will get to end up working on some of your own designs as well.
  5. See below for table of content for the course.

 

Who should take this course?

Who? It depends on your aim and passion. You are a html/css developer but finding difficult to please your employee or not getting enough projects. You are a designer and you are in search of front end dev. But thinking of learning the front end tech to save yourself on hiring devs. Then its definitely for you guys.

Also its not only for beginners, if you are already the front end dev and want to tighten your skills and knowledge then its also for you.

 

Course Content

 

HTML

HTML Basics
Html elements and its types
Elements attributes
Structuring semantic markup

 

CSS

Basic styling
Advance Styling
Removing browser specific styling
CSS3
Media queries (responsive styling)
Retina Support CSS3
Flexbox
Creating box-shadows/gradient/pattern

 

JS

Starting with js
Vanilla window load and ready
Using jQuery
Accordion/Lightbox/Tooltip
Form Validation
Masonry JS
Carousel
Parallax Effect
Autocomplete

 

Overall

Optimise for Load Speed
ie9+ compatible (ie10+ for flexbox)
Mobile devices compatible
Using text editors
Essential Editors packages
SEO Semanting markup
W3C Valid
Retina Supporting images
Drop-down Menu
Custom Forms
Using Bootstrap/Foundation
Using SASS/LESS

 

PSD to HTML/CSS/JS

Structuring a normal project (custom, or using any frameworks like foundation/bootstrap)
Using an app (prepros.io), faster coding and productivity
Page structure visualization
Things to think before starting
Taking note of mobile layout
Go with mobile first or not
Techniques for having same styling and layout across all browsers
Parallel coding or coding markup first and then css?
Checking W3C validations
Check Pixel perfection
Using text styles to match according to design
Using app like Zeplin/Avocode for faster implementation
Finish a psd from the starting to finish
 

Freelancing Tips

Using sites like Freelancer.com/Upworks
Creating good profile
Adding good list of portfolio
Writing good cover for the bid
Showing some past works
story_txt:
About Myself
I am Santosh Khanal. I live in capital city of Nepal. I have been working on front end and back end of web development for about 5 years. You can see my profile at freelancer.com.https://www.freelancer.com/u/khanalsantoshnp.html
 
I have been working on front end project for a very long time. I have got so much experience in html/css/js/jquery/scss/less. I have got success in every project I have worked on for a client. And my clients always seek me for their projects.
Just like the saying, (with great power comes great responsibility). I want to help you all who are seeking a career in front end web development.
I will teach you all the things required for starting and progress you as a great developer.
 
Short Summary
I had so much tough time starting my self. When I started working on this field, there were so less content to start learning.There was boundary for me. I used to search for tutorials and video lessons on youtube and other free sites. That's the first reason I could not get good content to start myself. I was keeping up with the flow and never stopped learning.
But this will not be with you. I want to make your carrier start with a bang and help you keep up with the flow. I will not only guide you to with the HTML/CSS/JS and help running the current flow. But also guide you to keep up with the updated things once they are available. Meaning, I will guide you to search and find things that will excel you further when there are different things coming along the way.
And furthermore I will make you be able to earn around $1.5k+ every month and it will increase according to your effort and commitment. You can apply/bid on projects online and get it. Or just go for a new job and get selected in front end web development and excel on it.
 

What You Get
I always dreamed of having a great instructor who knows how things are and what is the best method to learn. I expected an instructor to have some skill to show when things come along the journey. I know what it hurts, what are the pains and I want to you be aware of them along your journey to become successful as soon as possible.
 
Below are the things you get:

Guide to start along the HTML, get knowledge about every html elements, and writing semantic/seo friendly HTML.
You will follow along writing css and style the webpage all on your own. Along the journey I will guide you to make webpage same across all the browsers giving you details about the things they differ in browsers, give you hacks/tricks about things. And at last guide you to the pre-processor SCSS/LESS along the way.
Then I will give you knowledge on Javascript and jQuery, and help you make your webpage interactive. I will also give you tricks on how to find plugins, implement them and also learn how to work on some of them too.
And at last after I give you insight into the things needed for front end web development. I will show you how to finish up working on already designed psd and implement it from starting to the end. On this section, I may take up top 5 psd from you and implement them. so you will get to end up working on some of your own designs as well.
See below for table of content for the course.

 

Who should take this course?
Who? It depends on your aim and passion. You are a html/css developer but finding difficult to please your employee or not getting enough projects. You are a designer and you are in search of front end dev. But thinking of learning the front end tech to save yourself on hiring devs. Then its definitely for you guys.
Also its not only for beginners, if you are already the front end dev and want to tighten your skills and knowledge then its also for you.
 
Course Content
 
HTML
HTML BasicsHtml elements and its typesElements attributesStructuring semantic markup
 
CSS
Basic stylingAdvance StylingRemoving browser specific stylingCSS3Media queries (responsive styling)Retina Support CSS3FlexboxCreating box-shadows/gradient/pattern
 
JS
Starting with jsVanilla window load and readyUsing jQueryAccordion/Lightbox/TooltipForm ValidationMasonry JSCarouselParallax EffectAutocomplete
 
Overall
Optimise for Load Speedie9+ compatible (ie10+ for flexbox)Mobile devices compatibleUsing text editorsEssential Editors packagesSEO Semanting markupW3C ValidRetina Supporting imagesDrop-down MenuCustom FormsUsing Bootstrap/FoundationUsing SASS/LESS
 
PSD to HTML/CSS/JS
Structuring a normal project (custom, or using any frameworks like foundation/bootstrap)Using an app (prepros.io), faster coding and productivityPage structure visualizationThings to think before startingTaking note of mobile layoutGo with mobile first or notTechniques for having same styling and layout across all browsersParallel coding or coding markup first and then css?Checking W3C validationsCheck Pixel perfectionUsing text styles to match according to designUsing app like Zeplin/Avocode for faster implementationFinish a psd from the starting to finish 
Freelancing Tips
Using sites like Freelancer.com/UpworksCreating good profileAdding good list of portfolioWriting good cover for the bidShowing some past works

story:
Who We Are

We are a group of independent filmmakers and creatives from Dublin, Ireland. We have joined together to collaborate our skills and life experiences to create something unique for an Irish and International Audience.

Our Work

Chris (CO-DOP): http://www.directorchris.com/

Ving (CO-DOP): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSf3obJpFzIsQt...

Gráinne (Creative Director): https://catchingdreams.ie

What We Need

In order to get our Crime Drama Series off the ground we need your support. We need help with the production costs for our Pilot Episode. The costs mainly involve:

  • Sound Operator with own Equipment.
  • Lighting Specialist.
  • Other Equipment, Props and Wardrobe.
  • Post-Production Editors.
  • Location Hire, Expenses & Catering.

The Impact

It's been 4 years since Love/Hate painfully left Irish TV Screens, we feel there is a huge demand for a similar series and not just for an Irish Audience but internationally. Since the release of our first teaser trailer, we have received a huge response from the Irish public, with many wondering when they can look forward to watching the full episodes!

With your support we can bring our concept to life. The plan is to create a 30-40 minute Pilot Episode that we can use to pitch to potential broadcasting networks.

In the Press

http://www.echo.ie/show/article/no-mercy-callin... 

https://lovindublin.com/dublin/love-hate-dublin...

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Help us to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

If you know anyone who may be interested in supporting our project please forward our details to them.

Follow us on Social Media:

https://www.facebook.com/NoMercyIreland/

https://www.instagram.com/no_mercy_ie/

story:
Short Summary

‘The Card Room Chronicles’ is a developing web series consisting of six different stories, each with four unique characters in one location, centered around a single game of poker. Inspired by classic British crime fiction and high stakes storytelling, the series is set to unite new blood filmmakers with expert talent.

Episode two ‘Car Pool Poker’ finds 4 old friends and colleagues on the way to work whilst lamenting life, the monotony of routine and retirement plans. Nostalgia for past big risk poker games leads them to having one last high-stakes bet with their earnings on the line.

‘Car Pool Poker’ is scheduled for filming by mid-May 2017 and will feature four fantastic veteran actors, including:

Paul Barber (Only Fools & Horses, The Full Monty, 51st State)

Joe McGann (The Upper Hand, Terry Pratchett’s Truckers, Day & Night, Elf: The Musical)

Alan Rothwell (Coronation Street, Brookside, Heartbeat)

Derek Lawson (A Royal Night Out, Day Zero, Shameless).

The series is the creation of Producer and Writer Denis Crampton. Denis has now gathered a team of up and coming filmmakers from around the U.K. to work together in making the series a reality. This has already begun with Episode 1 ‘The Last Hand’ being completely filmed and in the final stages of post-production.

Four more episodes have also been written to make Card Room Chronicles become a 6-part series. Episode 3 is already in pre-production and will feature Coronation Street actress, Cherylee Houston (Izzy Armstrong), making her debut as a Director.

Your backing in making Episode 2 happen will not only help support independent Film and TV makers from the UK but will help set the series on a trajectory to complete all six episodes.

What We Need & What You Get

What we need is for our backers to come to the table and buy-in to be a part of the pot. Those with bigger stacks could double-down and…okay, enough with the poker lingo!

We need the backers, you guys and gals, to donate some money to see this project continue and come to light. Making high-quality episodes is not a cheap process, especially for an independent project. That is why we have looked over out budget with a fine-tooth comb to ensure that every penny is being used efficiently.

Most of the budget areas are easy enough to understand such as Cast/Crew costs and equipment hire but why the Police Hire? Well, the location we ideally plan to use is a public highway, which means a whole film crew will be around the area and on the road. Not only that but actors will also have access to prop firearms (that’s all we are saying without giving too much away!) in public, meaning the police will have to be involved regardless of the location used.

We have some exciting perks for you to choose from, where they are named and inspired from the game of poker. Why not go in for a ‘Raise’ to watch the finished episode in HD? Feel like you have ‘The Nuts’ to become an Executive Producer? Check out the perks on the right and see what tickles your fancy.

If we don’t reach our goal of £5,800 but come close, we will endeavour to ensure that the shoot goes ahead in May 2017. If not enough funds are reached then the project will be delayed until further funds are sought – the sooner the better and any backers will have their chosen perks honoured at a later date.

The impact from this crowdfunding will help further contribute to the growing online TV community within the UK and help employ local content creator, ensuring they can work creatively whilst paying the bills.  

Risks & Challenges

Like any filming project, there will be inherent risks. These risks will be minimalized and planned for thoroughly by the senior level crewmembers, all of who are professional and experienced industry members.

The highest risk we face is not raising enough funds in time for a May 2017 shoot: crew and cast are already set for the proposed dates and if for any reason this was postponed there would be a period of waiting until all involved were available at the same time. The episode would still be filmed at the earliest convenience for those involved but certain perks would therefore be delayed.

Other risk factors include:

  • Dealing with bad weather during the weekend of the shoot. Alternate locations are already being planned in case this occurs.
  • Cast and/or crew being unable to make a shoot date for unforeseen reasons. Alternate crewmembers would be sought in their stead and if actors weren’t available, then the project insurance would be used in case of an abandoned shoot.
  • Perks that include the completion of all six episodes (such as the DVD’s) are subject to when all episodes are fully complete. Although those involved will strive to make this happen as soon as possible there is no guarantee on when this would be complete.

These are the few risks we could find after reviewing every nook and cranny: they are few and far between. Not only that, the majority of them are risks any film and TV project would face. We aim to be as transparent as possible and our backers would be the first to know of any developments.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate then you can still help by spreading the word about the campaign. Share and repost the campaign links across social media and hopefully a friend, family member or colleague of yours can help us out. The further the campaign spreads, the more likely we will be funded.

If you like different aspects from different perks then please feel free to contact us to create a bespoke pledge just for you.

That's it from us! Thank you for taking an interest in our campaign and, just like in Poker, may lady luck always be on your side. Goodbye!

story:
Who I am and why I'm here

My name is Massimo and my mission is to get relaxed. How? I like to be massaged and  receive barbering service. More than this, I like to watch videos of people getting massaged and shaved. Because of this, I opened a YouTube Channel: ASMR Barber. After few years, it has more than 200 videos and over 190K subs!

Have you ever watched "World's Greatest Head Massage" ? Well the original video reached about 10 million views and I think that I did at least 50% of them :-D

That video inspired me so much that two years ago I decided to go to India looking for Baba, the cosmic Barber, and experience the cosmic massage...Yes, it was crazy, and yes, it was amazing.  Below the first cosmic massage of my life :-D

After the first trip, I became friends with Baba and the following year I was back in India to record the "India Tour" with him...and again it was an amazing experience.

So why am I here asking for your support?

Each year I make a new web series and this time I would like to make something more than amazing. Yes, you get it (the title of the campaign also helps you a little I think :-D): it's time to bring Baba in the US, it's time for An American Tour.

This tour will be different from the previous. It will be not just Baba and me, in this tour you'll have the chance to join us!

 "Wait a moment... I'll get to meet Baba? When? Where? How?"

Yes you will!

This is the roadmap of what you get for backing the total cost of the tour.

We're going to visit 4 cities (dates are little flexible :-))  :

  1. New York City  (from 14th to 20th of August) 
  2. Chicago (from 21st to 26th of August )
  3. Los Angeles  (from 27th of August to 1 of September)
  4. The 4th city is up to you, you'll decide where we will go.  (from 2nd to 8th of September)

And here are the perks:

5 EURO - Your name in the video credit!
You know the ASMR Barber YouTube Channel and you are a fan. By choosing this perk you'll contribute to this project and you will have your name listed in the credits of the American tour web series videos!  

10 EURO - Vote on where we go next!
Your name in the video credit and:
Do you want Baba and me in your city? Your perks will count as one vote!!! 
The most voted American city will be the 4th one after New York City, Chicago and Los Angeles. This perk will be up just for the first 15 days of the campaign, so hurry up with your vote :-D. You should write Your city together with Your name in the "Contribution Appearance" on your donation. (If you forget do not worry, I'll contact You :-) )

25 EURO - A signed postcard from the trip!
Your name in the video credit + Vote on where we go next and:
You will receive a signed postcard in your mailbox from one of the cities we will visit signed by Baba and me.

50 EURO - Official T-shirt!
Your name in the video credit + Vote on where we go and:
Are you a Baba Fan? Do you follow the ASMR Barber YoutTube Channel? By choosing this perk you'll get the official American Tour t-shirt !!!
 

150 EURO - Cosmic Massage in New York City, Chicago, Los Angeles or the 4th city You have chosen !
Your name in the video credit and:
Did you watch "World's greatest head massage" thousands of times to trigger your ASMR? Did you dream of yourself receiving it in Baba's barbershop? 
By choosing this perk you do not need to visit India, because Baba will visit your city and you will receive the World's Greatest Head Massage, Yes, the original one :-D . (When you choose this perk keep in mind our road map)

250 EURO - Dinner in New York City, Chicago, Los Angeles or the 4th city you have chosen!
Your name in the video credit and:
Do you want to meet Baba? Do you want to know what inspired the ASMR Barber YouTube channel?
With this perk you will have a dinner with Baba and me (on a mutually agreed-upon date and time following our road map)

500 EURO - Barbershop Sponsorship in New York City, Chicago, Los Angeles or the 4th city you have chosen!
A thank you in the credits! and:
Do you own a barber shop? Do you want to be protagonist of the American Tour web series on the web?
By choosing this perk you will be recorded while you are shaving my head and face and the video will be part of the ASMR Barber YouTube channel that reached 190K subscribers ;-). The video below reached more than 1.2M of views !!!

500 EURO - Massage therapist /SPA Sponsorship in New York City, Chicago, Los Angels or the 4th city You have chosen!
A thank you in the credits! and:
Are you a massage therapist or a chiropractor based on NYC, LA, Chicago or the city to choose? Do you want to be on the ASMR Barber YouTube Channel?
By choosing this perk You will be recorded while you are massaging me (I know it sounds strange but you know what I mean X-D ) and the video will be uploaded on my channel. 

 

Here's where the moneys goes


Risks & Challenges


I've made several trips looking for barbers and massage therapists, so I have a pretty good idea of the work and costs involved. However, this is my first IndiGoGo campaign, and my first time working with backers. So here’s something that we should take into account.

MEETINGS
This project will include several meetings (at least I hope X-D) so the management could be a little tricky. Please, try to be as flexible as possible​ to help us to satisfy everyone.

DISASTERS 
This project will include several flights, so there is the risk of both natural and unnatural disasters altering the plan as we go.

LOSS AND DAMAGE 
Equipment could get damaged. Footage could be lost or destroyed. Obviously, we will try to minimize this risk as much as we can, for example by making lots and lots of backups; however, bear in mind this might still happen.

INJURY /ILLNESS
Even if Baba and I both have quite strong bodies (That's true :-) ) we could get injured to the point that I can no longer go on with the tour.

FAMILY 
Family is the top priority in our life. If we need to stay home for any of them, this project is going on pause.


Other Ways You Can Help


Maybe you can't or you don't want to contribute. It's ok (:-(). Can you help us spread the word?  I'd really appreciate if you would share the campaign link on your socials 

Thanks a lot guys...and relax ;-)

Footage could be lost or destroyed. Obviously, we will try to minimize this risk as much as we can, for example by making lots and lots of backups; however, bear in mind this might still happen.INJURY /ILLNESSEven if Baba and I both have quite strong bodies (That's true :-) ) we could get injured to the point that I can no longer go on with the tour.FAMILY Family is the top priority in our life. If we need to stay home for any of them, this project is going on pause.
Other Ways You Can Help
Maybe you can't or you don't want to contribute. It's ok (:-(). Can you help us spread the word?  I'd really appreciate if you would share the campaign link on your socials Thanks a lot guys...and relax ;-)

story:
Short Summary

Hi! My name is Andrew and I am a Youtuber, content creator, and owner of upcoming production company, Court Jester Productions! This campaign is for Colors of the Rainbow, an animated series that I've had in the works since August of 2020. It's set in a world of personified colors and centers on eight best friends, who are the eight colors of the rainbow, living their lives in the city of Dathanna. By donating to this project, you will be helping me create my very first animated series, a medium that I've been passionate about for the longest time now, and with your help, I'll be making one of my own.

What We Need & What You Get

Realistically speaking, we'll be needing roughly about 20,000$ USD to make this happen.  Every penny of this will be going to our voice actors, animators, artists, writers, etc. Your contributions can get you rewards such as glimpses into our storyboards, character design sheets, animation tests, and more! Now, even if we don't reach our goal, I will still be using the earnings we've received towards the VAs and art/animation team.

The Impact

We're all aware of the nightmare last year was and even some of this year. We were ostracized from our friends, our family, jobs were lost, the world changed as we knew it and we had to adapt quickly. But something I've learned in my life is that laughter truly is the best medicine, be it the biggest laugh or the tiniest chuckle, your spirits raise after having a good laugh. And even though we're on the steps to putting this virus behind us, I wanna give people something they can watch and just forget about the troubles of their day for a little while by watching these wonderful characters.

Risks & Challenges

The only risk we face is not hitting our goal by the deadline, and even then, I have backup plans set up. If we don't reach our goal, I have a Patreon, a Ko-Fi, and a RedBubble set up so we'll still be making money either way.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate at all, that's totally fine! You can still help out the project by sharing the link to the project around, be it on Twitter, Discord, Facebook, just try to get the word out there!

Thank you all so much for reading and hopefully, we'll see you on Youtube with our very first show. Have a wonderful day and stay creative!

story:
What the heck's on The Happy Video Game Nerd Complete Series Blu-ray?

This is a massive package that contains a comprehensive collection of HVGN episodes and extras. Hours and hours of content, here's a breakdown!

The Happy Video Game Nerd Complete Series Blu-ray Includes:

  • Classic Episodes (full episodes +  quickie videos)
    • MetalStorm, Journey to Silius, Startropics, Splatterhouse Trilogy, Wild Guns, Little Nemo the Dream Master, Nightshade, Rocket Knight Adventures, Mega Man 9, D, DuckTales, Sold Separately - Hori Gamecube / SNES Controller, Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers, Disney / Capcom Games, Zombies Ate My Neighbors, Monster In My Pocket, Zoda's Revenge, Total Carnage, Ninja Warriors, Mighty Morphin Power Rangers, Gaming Historian: Shenmue, Krion Conquest, Mega Man 10, Zombie Panic in Wonderland, Crack Down, Clash at Demonhead, Enemy Zero, D2, Sweet Home, Ghoul Patrol, Gettin' Super Nerdy Splatterhouse Arcade vs TG16, Splatterhouse 2010, Sword of the Berserk Guts' Rage, Final Fantasy Mystic Quest, Gettin' Super Nerdy Rygar, Dragon Warrior 1 & 2, Gettin' Super Nerdy Final Fantasy 7 Demo, Gargoyle's Quest Trilogy, Burger Time World Tour, Earthbound, Lagoon, 1080 Snowboarding, Gettin' Super Nerdy Resident Evil 4 Demo, Eternal Darkness, Parasite Eve Trilogy, Doom Custom PS1 Edition, Point Blank Trilogy, Elemental Gearbolt, House of the Dead, Illbleed, Touch the Dead, Eternal Darkness Follow-Up, Doom 64, Rad Raygun, DuckTales Remastered, Castlevania Gameboy Trilogy, Loaded, Turok Rage Wars, Tetris & Dr Mario all restored to the highest quality possible. 
  • Exclusive Content
    • All new commentaries on every episode featuring guests,
      • Arin Hanson from Game Grumps
      • Matt McMuscles from Super Best Friends
      • Geoff Thew from Mother's Basement
      • Super Eyepatch Wolf
      • Pixel Dan
      • Happy Console Gamer
      • Alex Rushdy from 13am Games
      • Eric Lappe from LET'S GET!!
      • Lance from RWtv & The Video Game Years
      • John D from RWtv & The Video Game Years
    • ​A brand new, exclusive HVGN review of Crystalis for the NES and GBC
    • Making of the HVGN Crystalis review
    • HVGN Behind-The-Scenes Series Retrospective 
    • Outtakes, Outtakes, and More Outtakes!
    • Bonus Featurette's  from HVGN Vol 1 & 2 DVD
    • Region free and shipped worldwide by Fangamer!
  • HVGN Original Soundtrack CD Track Listing
    • HVGN Guitar Theme
    • HVGN Guitar Theme Remix
    • HVGN Original Theme
    • DuckTales Theme Remix
    • Rescue Rangers Theme Remix
    • So I Got This Salsa From The Internet (Nightshade Outtakes)
    • Send by Internet Except When Become Sick (DVD Vol 1 Outtakes)
    • Love The Elephant (DVD Vol 2 Outtakes)
    • (Everybody's Got) A Case of the Glitches (Derek @ MAGFest 8)
    • Ya Burnt (Derek @ MAGFest 9)
    • Whatever It Is, It's Getting Closer (D Review)
    • That's Another One For The Fire (D Review)
    • It'll Do 'Till The Mess Gets Here (D Review)
    • We Few Who Remain (Zombie Panic in Wonderland Review)
    • Through Still and Storm (Zombie Panic in Wonderland Review)
    • Born Like This, Into This (Zombie Panic in Wonderland Review)
    • Untitled Halloween 2010 Outtakes Song
    • A Flashing Light A Former Friend (Halloween 2010 Intro Video)
    • Search Orders From Satan (D2 Review)
    • Untitled Songs from D2 Review
    • Rescue Rangers Theme Remix, Derek Un-AutoTuned Vocal Version

Why a Pre-order Campaign? 

The HVGN DVDs released in 2011 and 2012 were funded out of my own pocket. I didn't need to turn to crowdfunding for those releases but Blu-ray duplication a much more expensive endeavor. But it also creates the unique opportunity to have seven years of internet history in one easy collection!

Supporters of this pre-order campaign will be the first to receive the Blu-ray for $25. You'll also have the chance to bundle your pre-order with either an HVGN T-shirt OR an HVGN Original Soundtrack CD for $35. If you need even more Happy Nerd, you can snag all three for just $45 (*while CD supplies last). This Blu-ray will be region free and shipped anywhere in the world!

But that's not the whole of it. Every pre-order goes to the upfront production cost of creating the Blu-ray. We are professionally producing these Blu-rays, and not only that, every pre-order helps us understand how many Blu-rays we need to order. 

What is the Happy Video Game Nerd?

The Happy Video Game Nerd is a web series created by Derek Alexander in 2007. The HVGN started off as a tongue-in-cheek parody of the then, and still, popular youtube show the Angry Video Game Nerd. The second episode won first prize in GameTrailer's Out Nerd the Nerd video contest. 

But after a few episodes, Derek dumped the parody gimmick and used the HVGN as a way to showcase lesser-known and cult retro video games. With professional, heavily researched, and tightly edited episodes, the HVGN found itself a successful cult show on youtube and websites like RetrowareTV. The HVGN ran for 7 years, amassed millions of total views, tens of thousands of subscribers, and proved to be an influential show to numerous popular youtube personalities and even a few indie game developers.

The entirety of the HVGN was produced in Anchorage, AK. In 2015, Derek, retired the name, relocated to Seattle, WA, and rebranded as Stop Skeletons From Fighting, adding Grace Kramer to the team. Derek and Grace continue to create videos about video games under the Stop Skeletons From Fighting banner.

story:
Short Summary

"Jason And Matthew" is a 22-24 minute sitcom that follows two childhood best friends on their journey through adulthood when they decide to move to New York City together in hopes of pursuing their dreams of acting (Jason) and modeling (Matthew). To make matters hilarious, both of the boys' divorced mothers move in across the hall from them. If that wasn't enough, both Jason and Matthew has unexpressed feelings for each other as the series goes along. You'll get to see how this affects their friendship going forward and the relationships with the people around them as well. More importantly, there will be lots of laughter and comedic moments to enjoy.

The series is created by, directed by, written by, produced by, and starring Jason Whatley. He created the sitcom due to his love for this genre style of television shows. Some of the many sitcoms he enjoyed growing up were I Love Lucy, The Carol Burnett Show, The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air, Good Times, A Different World, The Cosby Show, The Parkers, Baby Daddy, Moesha, Sister Sister, Martin, Everybody Hates Chris, George Lopez, Friends, Full House, Fuller House, and That's So Raven. Jason plans to incorporate some of his favorite elements of most of these shows as a way to honor them and the impact they've had on him as and actor and writer.

What We Need & What You Get

Jason has to raise for the production budget of a pilot episode provided by Pixel Productions. The amount goal to be met is $250,000. Anything raised passed that goal will go toward producing more episodes. Jason plans to have a full 13-episode season to start.

This includes:

  • Production cost from Pre-production to Post-production
  • Payment of entire cast and any additional hair/makeup they want 
  • Fulfilling backers rewards

 

REWARDS

Jason has created some amazing rewards for the backers of this campaign. This includes fan packs with signed logo t-shirts, red carpet premiere experience, private screening experience, producer credits, and even the chance to appear in the season finale as an extra. Check out these rewards and what they offer, then start donating!

The Impact

As stated, this campaign will open the door for the first season of "Jason And Matthew" to see the light of day. More campaigns will follow once this one proves successful. And with your contribute, which becomes your impact, we can achieve it together. This sitcom impacts the world by saving this dying style form of the sitcom genre and open doors for black gay leads on tv. We want to bring representation to the black gay community that shies away from the stereotype and tells us we can and are more than what society thinks or conditions us to think we are all about. Our promise to you all is to keep our word about these rewards and provide great content that we all can enjoy. 

Risks & Challenges

Lots of risks and challenges to definitely take into consideration when producing a series with this starter budget. 

One of the challenges we'll most likely face with the backers will be verifying you payment with your bank so the donations will go through. This really applies for the higher level rewards. 

Jason doesn't have a studio behind this project. The challenges here will range from production halts due to natural disasters to actors dropping out due to availability or other obligations.

A note about the rewards: Delivery dates are only estimates and could be subject to change at anytime. We plan to keep you all in formed going forward. Some rewards include digital delivery and physical delivery so please do not be alarmed if you receive one before the other and note that we're trying to get everything to everyone as soon as we can.

The VIP, Producer Credit, and Cameos will take place in San Diego, California on a date determined by production. We cannot provide transportation or accommodations. There will be additional paperwork required to fulfill some of these rewards for your protection and ours.

The BIGGEST CHALLENGE is getting this campaign in front of as many people as possible in the timeframe that Kickstarter allows us. Please, share with your friends, family, and colleges. We want to meet our goal.

WE KNOW WECAN DO THIS WITH YOUR HELP! PLEASE DONATE AND SHARE THIS PAGE!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help with a donation but would still like to support:

  • Tell a friend
  • Share this campaign

story:
From a very young age I have been passionate about acting, singing, music and writing. In this short film, I show all these interests with a story based on real events, which also aims to show a side of violence against women, and also to publicize this issue that affects so many countries in the world.

One night in October 1996, Isabel (25) understood that her husband Alberto (34) would be waiting for her at the bus stop as usual, with the intention of accompanying her on the dangerous journey from the bus stop to the house where she was they found. She lived in a poor neighborhood in Santo Domingo, the capital of the Dominican Republic.

While Isabel waits, she is frightened by the darkness of the environment. The streets are desolate, so Isabel decides to start walking the same route as every night, to make her wait less and meet her husband Alberto (34), who was already in the habit of picking her up at the bus stop when he left. his night job, which the financial situation had forced him to accept. Her when she was faced with the dilemma of staying or starting to walk home to meet Alberto, and although they were walking the same path and at the same time, they could not see each other, and while he was waiting at the bus stop, she came home . This triggers a series of confusing events, resulting in the violent event that presents the climax of this short film.

"Fourth" is based on a real life story, which shows how situations of verbal, physical and emotional violence end up undermining the self-esteem of people, and in this particular case, of women. Isabel expresses, from an omnipresent voice in the short film, in a quasi-poetic style, how this situation with her partner Alberto de ella has kept her in a state of extreme melancholy and emotional uncertainty for some time. Alberto, a man with a history of abandonment and alcoholism, presents traits of a passive-aggressive man.

"Fourth" deals with an evil that affects so many countries in the world, especially in Latin America: violence against women, and most of the time in the place where she should feel safest and happiest: her own home.

story:
BACK OUR CAMPAIGN AND YOU CAN SAVE

UP TO 50% OFF THE PRICE OF

THIS VIDEO SERIES PLUS RECEIVE ACCESS TO ANY CONTENT MADE IN YEAR TWO!

PRICES WILL INCREASE AFTER CAMPAIGN FINISHES!

Children learn best by DOING, not just WATCHING. Play is such an important aspect of a child's development - the more a child is ENGAGED in an experience, the more they will absorb and recall the important aspects of it. That's why we have created Explore, Discover & Grow.

Explore, Discover and Grow is a curriculum-based educational program that utilizes the key philosophies of Early Childhood education (such as play, interactive and immersive experiences and the whole child) and applies them to an entertaining format whereby your child can benefit from this ten minute, twice-weekly video series.  The program comes with teaching notes that outline key outcomes for children, as well as  teaching notes and suggested activities that can extend learning into other areas.

Less than 1 in 8 TV programs today are considered to be educational - certainly not in the sense of appealing to and educating the WHOLE CHILD.  This concept is at the very CORE of children's education - but alas, in today's world, TV programs and video content that embrace this philosophy, are few and far between!

To do this, your child needs to be ACTIVELY engaged in what they are involved with, not just passively observing a story.  We use techniques that are HARDLY SEEN ON TV these days - we use questioning to promote thought, imagination and creativity, direct communication with the viewer to promote self-esteem, modelling of actions and pro-social interactions to get your child moving and understanding social skills, verbal praise and inclusive language to make your child feel that they are the star of the show!

Growth occurs through change. Change occurs as a result of discovering things - either about the world, or yourself.  Discovery happens when there is exploration.

When you look at what's available on TV and YouTube today for children to watch, take note of how much opportunity there is for the child to be prompted to:

We think you'd be surprised at how little of the WHOLE child is actually engaged in most content they are viewing.  We GUARANTEE that each episode of EXPLORE, DISCOVER AND GROW will be written with the WHOLE CHILD in mind, and that engaging all 5 selves of the child is our priority.  This is how a child will develop and grow more quickly!

The Cognitive Self
This is the part of the child that focuses on problem solving and learning new information. 

The Creative Self
This is the part of the child that learns to be expressive, and creative through things like the arts and music. 

The Social Self
The child understanding things like family, friends and the community, and how to function successfully within those frameworks or systems.

The Emotional Self
Understanding your own emotions and building up the child's self esteem! Developing interests and encouraging individuality.

The Physical Self
Fine motor skills - like picking up a pencil or a pair of scissors - and gross motor skills, such as running, jumping, hopping or throwing. 

Watch the video below to hear Greg explain how segments of Explore, Discover and Grow will help develop ALL 5 selves of your whole child.



 

Even a seemingly "simple" song can cater to all 5 selves of the child, simulating a play experience.  To watch children interacting with one of the songs from Explore, Discover and Grow, and hear Greg explain how one of his songs can assist in developing all 5 selves of your child, watch the video below:

Not that we have seen - we are not saying there aren't!  We just haven't seen every app/game available for a child. Interactive apps/games don't mean that the whole child is being engaged. Fingers might move to make gestures on a screen, but what about gross motor skills?  Do these apps and games get them crawling, jumping, running, and dancing? We back our project to be a top quality educational resource for you to introduce to your child! That's why if we don't meet our funding goal, it will still be produced!  And if we value your child that much, shouldn't you too?

Looking at preschoolers from a child development point of view, they are egocentric, meaning that they see things from their own point of view, and like it when they are the centre of your attention - and that is not a bad thing, it's just a part of their development phase.  So, in order to engage them, we will produce Explore, Discover and Grow in a way that will appeal to that aspect of their development and heavily involve them in the show!  This is actually really good for their self-esteem and emotional development!

Explore, Discover and Grow heavily features music, making it GOOD FOR CHILDREN DIAGNOSED WITH ASD!

This program is for all children, but based on research we have done and Greg's own first-hand feedback from his work with The Wiggles, we believe it could have particular positive results for children who are diagnosed with Autism Spectrum Disorder.  There is a lot of research about the role of music in therapy for children, but also particularly for children with ASD, a program such as this can improve social behaviors, increase focus and attention, increase communication attempts (vocalizations, verbalizations, gestures, and vocabulary), reduce anxiety, and improve body awareness and coordination.

Because sadly, TV networks have shifted away from a focus on educational content and moved more toward advertising dollars raised through toy sales, and kickbacks from them.  Networks say they want 80% entertainment and only 20% education. Some networks just flat out say they are not an educational network - and you'd be surprised who said that!

Also sadly, a lot of TV executives do not seem to understand early childhood educational principles, about the egocentric, whole child, and how they think, and what they need to develop. If they do, then from discussions we have had with them, it seems it is not a priority for them. 

....in fact, it means you need to step up and help fill that void - just as we are doing!

 

 

The program is delivered twice a week via a streaming platform that you will be given access to once the program is funded and the content is produced.  You can log on at any time throughout the year and access the content that has been uploaded previously - so, by the end of the year, you will have access to the full set of 104 videos - AND BECAUSE YOU BACKED US, IF WE REACH OUR GOAL - YOU WILL GET ANY ADDITIONAL CONTENT CREATED FOR YEAR TWO FOR FREE!  

Content is themed so that each video focuses on a different area of interest.  We use these themes to deliver the concepts from the core curriculum areas in ways that are varied, engaging, fun and challenging, thus producing the best result from your child!

To produce a project of this magnitude and quality, requires a lot of resources - studios, music production, videographers, editors, animators, props, sets, talent, writers and more.  Whatever the amount we raise, we will ensure that the project gets completed! But essentially, the more funding we receive now, the more we can put into making EXPLORE, DISCOVER AND GROW the BEST it can be, and your child will be the beneficiary. Everything costs money -, particularly for quality.  Other producers say it costs up to $1 million to produce 26 x 7 minute episodes - that's 182 minutes of screen time.  WE ARE PRODUCING ALMOST 6 TIMES THAT AMOUNT OF SCREEN TIME, FOR ONLY TWICE AS MUCH AS THEY SAY.  Having been in this industry for a long time, Greg Page knows where the fat can be trimmed on projects such as this, so that there is only essential expenditure, not people standing around waiting to do their "bit"!

WHERE TO NEXT?

If we reach our goal, we will begin to invest in other creators of children's "edutainment" content, and make it available on our platform.  We see the future of children's edutainment as being something that we are strongly committed to, hence our plan to revive children's educational TV, and why we need your help!  Having a dedicated platform where children can watch edutainment content that is curated especially for them, with no risk of finding content that is not part of a healthy screen-time diet, is something that we have found the majority of parents want to have access to.  So, please, help us reach our goal so that we can keep the mission moving forward, for the sake of the future of our children!
story_txt:
BACK OUR CAMPAIGN AND YOU CAN SAVE 
UP TO 50% OFF THE PRICE OF THIS VIDEO SERIES PLUS RECEIVE ACCESS TO ANY CONTENT MADE IN YEAR TWO!PRICES WILL INCREASE AFTER CAMPAIGN FINISHES!
Children learn best by DOING, not just WATCHING. Play is such an important aspect of a child's development - the more a child is ENGAGED in an experience, the more they will absorb and recall the important aspects of it. That's why we have created Explore, Discover & Grow.

Explore, Discover and Grow is a curriculum-based educational program that utilizes the key philosophies of Early Childhood education (such as play, interactive and immersive experiences and the whole child) and applies them to an entertaining format whereby your child can benefit from this ten minute, twice-weekly video series.  The program comes with teaching notes that outline key outcomes for children, as well as  teaching notes and suggested activities that can extend learning into other areas.

Less than 1 in 8 TV programs today are considered to be educational - certainly not in the sense of appealing to and educating the WHOLE CHILD.  This concept is at the very CORE of children's education - but alas, in today's world, TV programs and video content that embrace this philosophy, are few and far between!
To do this, your child needs to be ACTIVELY engaged in what they are involved with, not just passively observing a story.  We use techniques that are HARDLY SEEN ON TV these days - we use questioning to promote thought, imagination and creativity, direct communication with the viewer to promote self-esteem, modelling of actions and pro-social interactions to get your child moving and understanding social skills, verbal praise and inclusive language to make your child feel that they are the star of the show!

Growth occurs through change. Change occurs as a result of discovering things - either about the world, or yourself.  Discovery happens when there is exploration.
When you look at what's available on TV and YouTube today for children to watch, take note of how much opportunity there is for the child to be prompted to:

We think you'd be surprised at how little of the WHOLE child is actually engaged in most content they are viewing.  We GUARANTEE that each episode of EXPLORE, DISCOVER AND GROW will be written with the WHOLE CHILD in mind, and that engaging all 5 selves of the child is our priority.  This is how a child will develop and grow more quickly!

story:
What is A Fairytale Undressed in Three Acts ?

A Fairytale Undressed in Three Acts is a short anthology series that reveals the misconceptions that people create about college years. Have you heard about finding the job of your dreams right after college? Finding the love of your life, the best friends and the best experiences during those 4 years, AKA, "best years of your life"? A Fairytale Undressed in Three Acts touches those topics in three short-films called acts; every act representing a different misconception.  The mission of this project is to display the life of a college student, showing the true conflicts and enjoyable experiences they come to face during the most important years of their lives. Each act being a different story with different characters.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have shot the first act called Canvas, which is showed in this page. The base budget of $2,250 will be for the production of the remaining two acts and to have a screening of the entire show at one of our local theatres in Carbondale, IL in this upcoming May.

These funds will be distributed to make the short-films as captivating as possible, assigned to pay our cast and crew, camera and lighting department, equipment rental, catering for cast and crew on shoot dates, wardrobe and props, post production, paying for film festival fees and submissions, as well for paying the screening venue. 

Any amount under or over $2,250 will go towards the short-films in order to create an exciting  experience and be able to share these stories with you. And to thank you for your generosity, on the right of this page we have cool perks to give away!

 

The Impact

The primary goal for A Fairytale Undressed in Three Acts is just like its name says it, to reveal and share the stories that individuals face as they enter adulthood. We want to create a relationship with the audience, as many individuals can relate with the themes presented in this series. We want to broadcast the college environment in a new and intimate way, letting people submerge into this world as it changes and transforms every single day, not only by showing the 'party' side of a person, but by also showing the side when they're alone and true personalities come to afloat.

We believe that this topic is important to this day. As the world changes and new labels like 'Millennials' begin to appear. It is important to understand the new generations, and with the power of the media we can begin to undress a fairytale that society and past generations have been told in a wrong way.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge for A Fairytale Undressed in Three Acts is timing. Three short-films in three months with the quality we aspire for is visionary and promising. In order to make the series as realistic as possible, we need to have different locations to shoot, as well as a big team to help in the production, all this makes time very valuable. Every act (episode) will have to be shot within a three-day period due to the tight schedule that we have. However, our funds would be a able to pay a bigger crew and make the production have a smoother flow in order to make a better series for you.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

No donation is too small and every little bit helps! We understand that not everyone can show their support through financial donations. That’s okay! You can help us out by sharing this campaign with your friends and following our social media:

  • Twitter: @TaleUndressed
  • Instagram: @FairytaleUndressed
  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FairytaleUndressed/

Thank you so much for your support, and hope to see you at the premiere!

We're raising funds for upcoming Dracul webseries towards the production needs, post production, marketing and film festivals.

We have a awesome production team. And we need your help to make the production and marketing go successful.

We’ll be picking some of the local contributors to award prizes to. The prizes include: Merchandise for the film or a poster, a chance to be on set of production, and a ticket premiere screening.

story:
Short Summary

  • HI, my name is Daniel White, I am an upcoming film maker and this is my first short film. I'm also from Winter Haven, Florida. 

  • This campaign is to help me get a fan film to the many fans of Spider-Man. This is project is very important to me because I've been a fan of Spider-Man since as long as I can remember and ever since Miles made his comic book debut in 2011 I've wanted to play him in the MCU and this is as close as I can come to that dream right now. I've trying to do this since the age of 15. 

    By contributing to this fan film you will be fulfilling a life time dream of mine, and through your support I can afford the equipment to make it a reality.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

- For this project I need around $5,000-$10,000 this will be going towards filming equipment, props, locations, and accurate costume designs.

This will be a web series, sort of like a Marvel Netflix series and this story is based in the MCU.

Even if we don't reach our goal, we will still use it to the best of our abilities and get the short film out but, it will take longer to get out.

 

The Impact

  • The Impact

    We're in a pandemic right now and I want to provide the people that are stuck at home something to look forward to. 

    I have been working on a script for the web series since Spider-Man: Homecoming and have been inspired to make this an fans have longed to see Miles in the MCU.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

- I have never given up hope for this vision and have stuck through with doing it for 4 years and I am very passionate about this film and it means so much to me, truly.

 

  • I will hire people to help with bringing this film to life, that includes VFX directing, and acting.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you cannot donate, that's fine, it would mean a lot to me if you shared it on any social medias you're able to.

    Please share this campaign!

story:
Who are you funding?

Reject-Men is a web series created by Boise filmmaker, Matt Mudd. He co-founded Clear as Mudd Films with his brother, Dylan Mudd in 2009. The company aims to extend opportunities to make films in their local community to anyone regardless of background. The Reject-Men almost mirror that goal in the series as a place where all mutants can have a home. That is why this project and its success is so important, because it will allow us to continue to do that in the future.

Top Billed Cast:

Matt Mudd: Gill Martin

Aaron Galaviz: Jacob Mendes

Dylan Mudd: Luther Schrute

Jake Arasim: James Alcott

What exactly are you funding?

This film is no-budget. The cast and crew of this project are all volunteers. This means all of the money we raise goes to increasing the quality of the project, as well as the quality of their experience. The funds will go to:

1. Feeding Cast and Crew

2. Props and Costumes

3. Post-Porduction

4. A few pieces of equipment we need for production.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

PLEASE SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN. The more shares we get the more funds we raise. Share it across all of your social media platforms. Share more than once! Thank you in advance.

story:
Well, it’s finally happened. After two years of planning, countless hours of meetings, research and brainstorm sessions, we at Ottawa Paranormal Research & Investigations are excited to announce the launch of the first season of our show, Into the Haunting.

We have partnered with Ottawa based Trinity Productions to create the show for public release, and we can’t wait to get started. Season one will include 10 episodes focusing on haunted locations in Ottawa and the surrounding area. To bring this dream to life, the last hurdle we must overcome is funding. We need to raise $1500.00 to shoot the pilot episode, and we are asking for your help.

We aren’t asking you to blindly donate money to our project, there is something in it for you. Every person who donates even $5 to this pilot episode, will be entered in to a draw to join us during an investigation for an episode later in season one. For every $5 up $25, you will receive one entry into the draw. Anyone who donates $30 or more will receive six entries into the draw, and will also receive a ticket to Paracon 2018, which we will be announcing dates for in a few months. Spoiler alert… it’s going to be amazing this year. For ever $5 over 30 (up to $45) you will receive an additional entry into the draw.

Anyone who donates $50 or more will receive 15 entries into the draw, a ticket to Paracon 2018, and will receive a Thank You in the pilot episode credits. For ever $5 after $50, you will receive an additional two entries into the draw.

We appreciate all your support and are wildly excited to get Into the Haunting underway.

Any donation that exceeds our goal will go directly into Paracon 2018.

Happy Hauntings,

Ottawa Paranormal Research and Investigations

story:
WHAT IS FLAT PACK CHALLENGE?

Two teams of two go against the clock to complete a series of flat pack furniture builds. This fifteen minute programme consists of two challenges in which the contestants have to face unusual obstacles while trying to assemble everyday homeware. The project development team has worked to deliver a fun and exciting programme inspired by old school game shows, bringing all of the family together on the front room couch.

We are a team of Film and Television Production students and this is our final university project.
We want to showcase all of the skills that we have acquired over our three year course. We have the technical skills and the necessary access to create a brilliant game show, we need your help to gain additional support and bring the Flat Pack Challenge vision to life.

This project is extremely important  to us because it is our first television game show. Your contribution will allow us to produce this project on a professional level. 

WHAT DO WE NEED FUNDING FOR?

We will ensure that all donations are used to make brilliant improvements to our programme. 
Here are some of the key aspects of the project that the funding will be used for...

  • ART DEPARTMENT
    We are building an entire television studio set from scratch, this will be the highest cost of our project.
  • TALENT
    Our presenter will be crucial for making our show fun and entertaining.
  • PRODUCTION 
    We need to pay for food and transport for our cast and crew. 
  • MARKETING
    Once our project is complete we would like to but if forward to various competitions and share it with the world.

THE TEAM

Marc Hackett, Creator and Head of Cameras 



As Flat Pack Challenge format creator and Head of Cameras, I will be working closely with both the Producer and Studio Director to deliver a visually exciting show. Since the age of nine I have loved cameras and the opportunities that come with the moving image. I am now finishing my degree in Film and Television Production and wish to pursue a career in television camera operations. With my previous work experience at BBC Scotland and Ideal World (Shopping Channel), I am motivated to demonstrate my skills and further develop my knowledge of the studio environment.

Natalia Rogowska, Producer

I decided to get involved with Flat Pack Challenge because of the brilliant and original format idea. I have worked in the role of Producer for numerous fiction and factual projects, however, I have not had much involvement with television programming. With a determined and highly skilled team behind me, I hope to make Flat Pack Challenge a fun and engaging game show for the whole family. 

Cara Tomlinson, Studio Director

Flat Pack Challenge is an exciting programme packed with family fun. As Studio Director, I will develop the game show to bring all of the technical aspects of the programme together creatively. I hope that my previous experience in film and television production helps to inform our project and bring the quality of Flat Pack Challenge to a professional level. 

Daria Hupov, VT Executive



As a filmmaker, I love all stages of a production: from planning and directing, to editing. That is why I am very pleased to be the VT creator for Flat Pack Challenge. I enjoy capturing moments and showcasing them, therefore enhancing the show's quality. I am excited to work with this talented crew in order to bring to life a fun game show.

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

We are extremely grateful for any donation, if you are unable to support this project financially please share our Indiegogo page and follow us on social media to increase the public reach of Flat Pack Challenge.
story_txt:

Two teams of two go against the clock to complete a series of flat pack furniture builds. This fifteen minute programme consists of two challenges in which the contestants have to face unusual obstacles while trying to assemble everyday homeware. story:
Who are we?

Overeager artists, tired of waiting for representation. Nerds with not enough free time. Trans people in bathrooms. We're a collection of folks who believe in telling stories about those who haven't had their stories told. With your help, we hope to make this story engaging, inspiring, and just plain hilarious.

Oh, did you want to know, like, our names or whatever? Sure, if you wanna be boring about it.

Lia is an overly enthusiastic lesbian from Omaha, Nebraska. She pretends to be a big city girl, but she still smiles on the street. Since graduating summa cum laude from NYU, she's been putting her New Media degree to (unpaid) work. Her past projects include a fiction podcast, "Overkill," and an anthology of queer joy featuring 24 artists from seven countries. She is a 2019 Writers Omi Fellow, a 2018 CUPSI champion, and a 2017 finalist for NYC Youth Poet Laureate. In her free time, she likes to take selfies she'll never post.

Marley is an indecisive non-binary filmmaker from the Bay Area, California. The only thing they’re certain of is that they’re a dreamboat with extraordinarily long limbs. They were an NBCUniversal PitchNY 2018 writing finalist, won the Audience Choice Award at the Tisch 2018 Showcase for a comedy skit, and worked as a VICE Producing Fellow, focusing on pitching intersectional documentaries. Outside of art, they lead student workshops as an ambassador for the queer non-profit Just Like Us. They're known for oozing dyke energy.

For more information on the ever-expanding group of people making this show happen, stay tuned!

And whose story is it, anyway?

JORDAN's anxiety and penchant for panic attacks hardly make them an ideal candidate for a job in customer service, but their empty wallet leaves them with no other options.

May is smart, outspoken, and occasionally annoying. Unfortunately, her penchant for emotional repression doesn't serve her well as a cyber-certified therapist at a tech start-up.

Eddie's parents would pay for anything she ever wanted, but she'd rather be a bartender than a spoiled brat. That is, until it comes time to pay tuition for her third degree.

So, why should you give us your money?

To put it simply, making great art requires great sums of money. The first season of STALLED is the length of a feature film, and we think it can be every bit as beautiful. Here's the breakdown:

So let's be real...

This is a massive project. We'll be on-set for a full two weeks, creating over two hours worth of original content. For many of our cast and crew members, creating this show will be as time-consuming as a full-time job. Asking for money makes us feel very corporate and icky, but there's simply no other way to make it happen. We need your help.

Can't donate?

That's okay! You can still help us out by:

  • Sharing our campaign! Tell your friends, your gay cousin, your sugar daddy. Annoy strangers on the street. Find an empty brick wall and spray-paint our QR code next to the words "be gay, do crimes."
  • Follow us on social media! @STALLEDSERIES can now be found on Instagram and Twitter.

story:
Short Summary

  • Contributions toward producing the trailer will enable us to pitch our sitcom project to Internet programming executives at Netflix Studios, Amazon Studios, CBS All Access and YouTube Originals. We seek their financing and green lighting for our proposed 1/2 hour sit-com series named Happy Endings. Hey, it's TV-14 rated.

What We Need & What You Get

The break down in more detail:

  • We need $4,888.00 to pay professional actors and video crew to create the 2 1/2 minute sizzle reel which features the funniest scenes from our half-hour pilot script.
  • When you contribute $40 you become an AcuSpa Member,  giving you 20% OFF for a year. The current membership is $50 but is now reduced 20% when contributing to the project.
  • 150 contributors of $20 will receive one  "swanky hanky", Imported 100% Cotton Handkerchief/Bandana 14"x14" with the Custom Printed show title Happy Endings logo.
  • If you for some reason we don't reach our entire goal, the monies will go toward contributor's  personal AcuSpa account as pre-paid services of their choice..

The Impact

Your contribution will make a difference in starting important conversations:

  • Comedy often reveals serious issues about race, gender, politics, immigration, money, empowerment, culture, language, entitlement, generational differences, empathy and love.
  • Happy Endings on the surface is a sitcom aimed at light hearted laughs with a dash of serious social messages that speak to who we are and what we aspire to be.
  • Think BBC's hit sitcom Faulty Towers meets all Chinese cast Joy Luck Club.

Risks & Challenges

The risks and obstacles to achieving our goal of green lighting a sitcom are dependent on timing, project genre need and access to studio "gatekeeper" executives who are subjective and fickle by job description.

  • We are confident the trailer will be professionally produced on time and on budget by hiring talented comedic actors and a seasoned video crew using their high quality equipment .
  • Doug has over 40 years of work experience in the television industry and is a member of the Producers Guild of America with access to influential producers, studios, and networks.
  • Our plan will have our Sales Agent submit the trailer with a pitch deck and one-sheet synopsis to key production companies, distributors, financiers, studios and Internet platforms to seek their financing to green light the series.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, you can help promote our campaign:

  • Get the word out and forward our campaign link to your friends and family.
  • Participate in the video shoot as a background actor! Ask Doug for details.
  • Visit AcuSpa at 1081 Seven Locks Road, Potomac, MD 20854

Thank you and Be well, -Doug & Danlu @ AcuSpa
